mapper.sql: user_id, email, name, password, role, is_activated, info, update_time, create_time, user_code
mapper.select:
select
from qmoj_user where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} or email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or user_code=#{userCode,jdbcType=CHAR} limit 0, 1
mapper.insert: insert into qmoj_user (email, name,is_activated, password, role, user_code, info, update_time) values (#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isActivated,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{password,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into qmoj_user
user_id,
email,
name,
password,
role,
is_activated,
info,
update_time,
create_time,
user_code,

mapper.update:
update qmoj_user
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=CHAR},
role = #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_activated = #{isActivated,jdbcType=TINYINT},
info = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
